It utilizes Heliox as a primary carrier gas that offers the opportunity for a more efficient and more comfortable respiratory treatment. The device is designed and developed to replace conventional inhalers and nebulizers and is designed to effectuate the rapid and measured delivery in its purest form of the desired pharmaceutical directly into the lungs generally utilizing a mixture of helium and oxygen (”Heliox”) to carry the chemically active pharmaceutical (liquid or powder) directly into the bloodstream to treat lung disease and other conditions. Description: BUTTON Wallet is multi crypto currency wallet with exchange in Telegram
Full Description: Button Wallet is a messenger-based software solution for trading and buying digital assets. A client-side application based on existing infrastructure, Button is built on Telegram messenger with principles of decentralization. Button focuses on optimizing usability and security for users looking to split the finances of shared experiences with friends. A good use case is friends sharing housing, ticket and dining expenses (like Coachella) within an existing group chat, like Telegram. Whether needs are compensating someone for a small freelance gig, tipping a barista, or sharing a meal with friends, Button users can send funds to their friends using only Telegram usernames. The Venmo for crypto, the bot has gained 150k users since launching in Q4 of 2018.  Our Telegram wallet allows anyone in the world to easily hold digital assets or exchanges cryptocurrency or tokens. Button’s Telegram wallet supports BTC, ETH, LTC, BCH, ETC, Waves, Stellar Lumens (XLM) and ERC-20 tokens. US users may also purchase cryptocurrency with fiat money (US Dollars). Telegram TON investors anticipate the release of TON (Telegram Open Network) grows as $1.7B has been invested into Telegram via Grams. Button Wallet will prepare for this by facilitating the exchange of grams for other cryptocurrencies.  Overall, buying cryptocurrency can be confusing for users. Sometimes it can take up to three weeks to be verified for a new user to purchase crypto with fiat within the US. With the integration of Wyre into the wallet, users in the U.S. can become verified to purchase cryptocurrency with a debit card usually within one hour. Button is focused on community and evolution to continue to optimize financial technology for users to easily and safely manage their fiat and digital assets at their own pace based on individual needs. Users maintain control over their finances for optimal ease of use with the push of a button.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Lending and Investments, Other, Payments, Software
Founders: Alexandr Safonov, Kirill Kuznetcov, Nick Kozlov

Industries: Big Data, Cyber Security, Information Technology, Privacy, Software
Description: Trūata offers a new approach to handling data anonymization and analytics.
Full Description: Trūata offers a new approach to handling data anonymization and analytics to help organisations meet the standards of personal data protection envisioned by the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).  The Trūata Anonymization Solution is designed to deliver actionable insights to its customers who operate in multiple industries including financial services, telecoms, hospitality, retail and travel. Trūata independently anonymizes a customer’s data, giving that customer the freedom to carry out analysis while protecting people’s personal data. The Trūata solution is specifically designed to fully meet the high regulatory thresholds for anonymization as the original source data and the anonymized data will not at any time co-exist in one organisation.  This ensures that analytics can be conducted across a customer’s entire data set while only analysing the fully-anonymized versions of that data.    Conceived by its founding beneficiaries, Mastercard, C3 IoT and IBM, Trūata provides a new standard in data hosting and anonymization. Using proprietary processes, methodologies and intellectual property, its offerings make it possible for organisations to analyse their data while complying with the privacy and data protection requirements of the GDPR. IBM has been selected by Trūata to be its foundational partner for strategic technology and services that will include cloud, analytics and cognitive computing capabilities.  Trūata’s innovative trust structure offers a new and unique solution that proactively safeguards privacy and engenders trust. Because of its governance structure, Trūata operates independently of its beneficiaries and customers, thereby allowing it to maintain direct control over data hosting and analytics on behalf of its client companies.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Software

Description: PAYMYNT is a financial growth app that combines mobile commerce, investing, cash and crypto rewards all in one digital wallet.
Full Description: PAYMYNT is a digital commerce and mobile banking app with a built-in universal cashback and crypto rewards incentive. It merges mobile and e-commerce, brand loyalty, fintech, and blockchain technologies. It created the Mobile Rewards Marketplace, a single destination to shop, save, earn, bank, and invest with a smartphone.  PAYMYNT Rewards Marketplace is an online shopping app designed with rich, cash-back, crypto, and credit incentives.  It's configured for IOS, Android users, and a web browser.  Consumers shop as usual but earn cash-back from thousands of participating merchants with the brands they love, accumulating incredible financial incentives each time they use the platform. In addition to the cashback rewards,  PAYMYNT created a universal digital rewards token called the MYNT Coin. MYNT coins are pre-mined and earned via a "Proof of Earning" from customer's online and in-store purchases. MYNT coins are the foundation to the universal rewards platform.  Now consumers can finally leverage more of their spending through one daily "go-to" smart app.  MYNT coins can be used as a medium of payment exchange or as a store of value.  MYNT's are tokenized from the MYNT points program and issued via a smart contract on the Stellar blockchain without any transaction fees. PAYMYNT's long term plans are to create a digital wallet, debit card, p2p payment features, and personalized investment products to improve its customer's financial well being.   Its the most rewarding mobile commerce and banking app for the next generation.

Description: Jmem Technology is a hardware Security IP provider.
Full Description: The development of technology is skyrocketing in this era. We find that the issue of information security is getting more and more important. Smart home appliances, monitors, electric vehicles being hacked are the topics often seen on news. Therefore, our team dedicate ourselves to avoid these problems from happening. We developed a new kind of memory called MSOTP(Multi-States and Multi-Bits one time programmable). With MSOTP, we can have more possibility on our transistors, and thus become much harder to be hacked and to reverse engineer. In addition, due to the characteristics of Multi-States and Multi-Bits, it is more area and power efficient with our products. We hope that people around the world can totally feel free to use IoT devices without worrying whether the information security is safety or not one day in the future.

Description: Revenue management and payment platform
Full Description: We are a SaaS company that offers a modern revenue management and payment platform.  As a lot of invoices are not paid on time and many businesses still inefficiently manage invoices via spreadsheets we build a solution to set effective and systematic revenue collection strategies. Our platform helps businesses to get paid faster, considerably reduces late payments and saves a lot of company resources. We create a positive impact on revenue and cash flow as overdue invoices are automatically chased - businesses don’t miss any invoice and act on every late payment ASAP. We facilitate late payment chasing and communication with clients using automated and personalized reminders (mail, SMS, voice). Instapay automatically reconciles payments, automatically detects late ones and if needed - sends personalized reminders or triggers predefined actions according to the collection policy set by platform users.   Instapay is a central place to track all payments and invoices. Thanks to the integrations with accounting systems, banking accounts and payment getaways we create a safe financial ecosystem, so that our clients could conveniently manage all invoices from one place. Businesses can also use our API to create customized data flows between their CRM or EPR systems and Instapay. Real time financial analytics and business friendly reports help businesses to easily monitor crucial collection processes in the company or identify late payment issues. Instapay organizes financial chaos, adds clarity to the company and assists in prioritizing and taking proper collection actions.    Instapay offers software that helps to: - create customizable billing plans (subscription engine for offline and online payments)  - create revenue collection workflows (automated payment reminders via mail, SMS, voice)  - receive money on scheduled time,  - automatically identify late payments,  - manage communication with clients,  - analyze financial condition in real-time,
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

In February 2013, a paper in Cell (Cell, 152, 1065-76, 2013) highlighted for the first time that PlGF – placental growth factor – plays a vital role in the brain. Its expression is required for the growth and spread of medulloblastoma, a rare, life-threatening brain tumor that mainly affects children. The paper was based on pre-clinical research conducted by Prof. Rakesh Jain from the Massachusetts General Hospital at Harvard (Boston) and the research team of Prof. Peter Carmeliet from VIB/ KU Leuven.

Description: Corazon Capital is a venture capital firm focused on early-stage opportunities.
Full Description: Born out of a love for building startups and a passion for backing entrepreneurs with heart, Corazon Capital (spanish for “heart”), a leading Chicago-based venture fund, brings a coastal approach to Seed and Series A investing. With a rare blend of investing experience and operating expertise, Corazon provides unusually pragmatic, actionable counsel to the entrepreneurs it supports. Corazon believes that the best entrepreneurs and the smartest VCs will intentionally solicit both financial and operating investors in their syndicates, with Corazon recognized across geographies for its deep operating knowledge and reach inside and outside of Chicago. Corazon’s co-founders, Sam Yagan and Steve Farsht, have accomplished track records as investors and operators. Sam co-founded SparkNotes, eDonkey, and OKCupid before posting up as CEO of Match Group (NASDAQ: MTCH) through its IPO, and most recently taking the reins as the CEO of Shoprunner. As a General Partner at Norwest Equity Partners, Steve participated in its growth from five to twenty-five investment professionals. He honed his operating chops as CEO of DCM Services, an NEP portfolio company. After moving to Chicago, Steve immersed himself in the startup ecosystem, first as COO of Tap.me and then co-CEO of Techstars Chicago.  Upon launching its second fund, Corazon added Phil Schwarz, the former CMO of Tinder, where he was responsible for growth, brand and retention marketing on a global basis. Previously, Phil was Head of Growth Initiatives at Match Group and co-founder of the Kaplan/Techstars EdTech accelerator. Together, Corazon’s principals have founded six companies through to four exits, served as CEOs of companies worth over $5 billion (including taking a company public), executed over $1 billion in acquisitions, invested in excess of $300 million in private companies, and held over 30 board seats.

It also provides cloud management and support services; CPU, memory, and disk utilization services; and Web servers, databases, cache systems, and more.  Moreover, Nubity installs, configures, patches, monitors, and troubleshoots Linux distros and Windows servers. It supports Web and databases technologies that include base technologies, Web servers, big data and NoSQL, database engines, and common apps.  Dario Peña and Juan Ozino Caligaris founded Nubity on November 1, 2013. It has its headquarters in Mexico City.

If you are a mid-market or enterprise B2C or B2B seller using disparate, legacy systems to run your offline and online commerce, marketing and payments operations, XStak is the all-in-one solution for all your woes. It enables you to deliver best in class customer experiences, removes high capex, lowers opex, increases your margins and provides real time actionable insights in to your business. XStak helps you become an omnichannel retailer with the following modules: - commerce (we have a POS, distributed inventory and order management, last-mile logistics and fleet management, and headless quick commerce modules) - marketing (we have customer segmentation, product recommendations, ad network and email provider integrations, and loyalty management modules) - payments (we enable card, wallet, BNPL payments online and have offline card readers integrated with our POS) - BI (we real time insights into offline, online, commerce, marketing, payments operations) All this for a transaction based pricing model!
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Hardware, Information Technology, Payments, Sales and Marketing, Software

Description: The Gibraltar Blockchain Exchange (GBX) is an institutional-grade token sale platform and cryptocurrency exchange.
Full Description: As a subsidiary of the Gibraltar Stock Exchange (GSX), the GBX aims to be the world's first licensed and regulated token sale platform and digital asset exchange that is operated by a European Union (EU) regulated stock exchange. The GBX is expected to be a global listing and token sales springboard for utility tokens that have satisfied a strict due diligence and admissions process as well as a high-quality digital asset exchange. In this regard, the GBX intends to set a higher standard for token issuance and trading for the benefit of all market participants. The GBX will benefit from the jurisdiction's Distributed Ledger Technology Regulatory Framework which came into effect on 1 January 2018. From this date, firms, in or from Gibraltar that in the course of business use DLT to store or transmit value belonging to others, and whose activities are not regulated under another financial services framework, will be regulated in Gibraltar.

Industries: Analytics, Auto Insurance, Big Data, Data Visualization, Fleet Management, Information Technology, Location Based Services, Mobile Apps, Predictive Analytics
Description: We empower our clients to design and implement new data-driven products and services based on mobility data.
Full Description: ABOUT THE COMPANY Motion-S is empowering its clients to design and implement new data-driven products and services in smart mobility, insurance, and the automotive industry by collecting, augmenting, analyzing, and profiling vast amounts of data from moving vehicles and individuals. The company is a leading data-driven behavior analytics solution provider in the mobility ecosystem and a trusted partner for companies from multiple industries providing them with the most advanced, accurate, and customized solution on the market – giving them a head start in telematics. The Motion-S mobility analytics platform transforms raw location and car data from smartphones, simple trackers, databases, or car data platforms into actionable insights – providing a deep understanding of individual mobility patterns. Predictive analytics in terms of risk, car health, and eco-efficiency allows fleet managers, insurers, OEMs, smart mobility operators, public authorities, and transportation providers to optimize their offer and improve their value propositions. OUR PRODUCTS & SOLUTIONS Motion-S started building its expertise in mobility data analytics in 2014. Since then, the company has developed and implemented services and solutions for five main industries: Insurers, Fleet Operators, Telematics Service Providers, Smart Cities & Governments, and Automotive & OEMs. As such we provide our clients with solutions for Risk Profiling, Claim Analytics, Fraud Detection, Data-driven Insurance, Pre-sales / Upsell / Cross-sell Support, Fleet Optimization, Predictive Maintenance, Eco-Efficiency, Mobility Analytics, Carpooling and Car-sharing, Transportation Network Analytics, Infrastructure Analytics, Lifestyle analytics as well as Engineering and Product Improvement.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Apps, Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Design, Financial Services, Information Technology, Internet Services, Mobile, Navigation and Mapping, Software, Transportation

Description: Oxara is a community interested in moving toward sustainable construction and circular economy.
Full Description: Oxara is a community interested in moving toward sustainable construction and circular economy. The construction industry is facing major challenges including scarcity of resources especially sand, CO2 emission due to the large production of cement. Their solution consists of using the landfill waste (excavation materials) that is locally available to produce a poured earth concrete.  Now Oxara poured earth concrete has all the advantages of concrete but it is cheaper and 90% more ecofriendly. The envisions gathering a global community and providing it with access to sustainable and affordable housing. Oxara believes in serving society starting with its own community of employees and clients. Oxara was founded in 2018 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

Description: ALUULA Composites allow for a near-endless spectrum of products to be made lighter and stronger by moving away from traditional textiles.
Full Description: ALUULA Composites is a new class of composite materials built from components with eight times the strength-to-weight ratio of steel, and yet lighter than nylon, polyester or aramid. Using a patented and proprietary approach to increase fiber strength at the molecular level, ALUULA core weaves and outer facing films are fused without the use of heavy glues. This remarkable process not only allows ALUULA to achieve strength to weight ratio materials that have been previously unachievable, but creates a recycle-ready material.  Partnering with world-class brands, ALUULA Composites is quickly becoming the top choice for innovators seeking to set a new standard of high-performance. ALUULA is a Canadian company founded by a team of highly experienced chemists and engineers who share a common passion for exploring and enjoying the outdoors. They have created a new realm in dimensionally stabilized multilayer materials that are the result of an innovative bonding of co-polymer layers, creating composites which are extremely light, highly tear and stretch resistant, recycle ready, and are easily fabricated into a multitude of products across a wide range of markets. ALUULA Composites strives to develop products and processes that are not hazardous to our environment and minimize the footprint we leave behind.

Description: Createlink Technology is enterprise-level graph database provider. The core product Galaxybase is Native Distributed Parallel Graph Platform
Full Description: Founded in 2016, Zhejiang Createlink Technology(also known as Zhejiang Chuanglin Technology) provides professional and high-quality services around graph database, graph service, and graph computation. Backed by an excellent team consisting of big data architects, database experts, data scientists, leading graph theory researchers, and experienced engineers, CreateLink independently developed its core product Galaxybase, a pure graph database from the ground up.  Galaxybase enjoys a reputation for being the first domestic native, distributed, and massively parallel processing graph database for enterprises, and it holds a competitive advantage over similar products with regard to real-time CRUD operations across massive interconnected data. By storing data in nodes, edges and attributes with index-free adjacency, Galaxybase supports linked data analysis both effectively and efficiently. From the perspective of business, Galaxybase together with other graph technologies will facilitate rapid contextualization for decision-making in organizations worldwide. To date, CreateLink has created considerable revenues while at the same time saved large amounts of costs in hardware input for consumers, many of whom are top companies in industries like Finance, Internet, Energy, Governments, to name but a few. Creativity lies in the ability to connect the dots. CreateLink connect.

Description: Hongji Bike is the largest producer of e-scooters and other public sharing electric vehicles
Full Description: CHANGZHOU, China, May 6, 2019 /PRNewswire/ -- The hardware team of Mobike, the world's first manufacturer of stake free bikes for sharing, is now in a new quest of establishing itself as the solution provider for international shared mobility industry, and is planning to enter the market of high-end bicycles. In 2017, Mr. Xu Hongjun, co-founder and former vice president of Mobike, who had been in charge of hardware developing and manufacturing, founded Hongji Bike. His entrepreneur partner includes Mr. Wang Chao, designer of the classic Mobike model and founder of Kaiyun Motors. After Mobike was acquired by Meituan, most engineers from the Wuxi hardware team also joined Hongji Bike. At the China Cycle 2019, the largest bicycle fair in China that will be held in Shanghai this May, Hongji Bike will showcase its overall solutions for shared-mobility and custom-made / high-end bikes for both corporate customers and individual consumers, along with a gold prize-winning bike model at this fair. As Mobike and OFO quickly blossomed in China and across the globe, new competitors from other parts of the world have entered the market. The solution that Hongji Bike is going to display at the fair has been proved effective through our cooperation with many shared mobility startup companies worldwide. In May 2018, Hongji Bike received an order of 40,000 E-scooters from Lime, a shared mobility company based in North America. In around a month, Hongji Bike finished design, modeling, production and exportation, tackling Lime's urgent need of supply. After the Lime project, Hongji Bike broke the ice and attracted various shared mobility operators, to become its new customers, providing them with E-scooter, E-Bike and traditional shaft-driven bicycles. Xu Hongjun believes that Hongji possesses the capability to develop motors and control system, and is able to independently develop and manufacture system control units. It can deliver products with an appropriate and flexible cost under the rigorous requirements of the shared mobility market. Also, Hongji Bike is an expert in mass-production with its own factories and sophisticated supply system, able to react quickly to buyers' needs. Furthermore, Hongji Bike is engaged in exporting solutions for multiple shared mobility scenarios including in-park transportation, as well as providing services in product design, engineering technologies and manufacturing. And in the future, it is going to launch high-end bikes targeted at the European consumer market. SOURCE Hongji Bike
Industry Groups: Hardware

Users interact with Alex via existing channels – including Messenger, SMS, email and soon voice. There are no portals and logins - which is driving user-adoption. Our property management customers are finding that 62% of all tenant requests are being raised via Alex (and largely automated) which is reducing their email and phone traffic. Description: OTSO Fintech enable financial online brokerage with social finance eco-system for the global markets.
Full Description: OTSO is a FINTECH company focusing on solutions for Online Derivative Market (Traditional and Web 3.0). We build software and trading algorithms for online Brokerages, delivering a service to 200+ clients worldwide.  Through our experience we discovered number of deep problems that Brokers are struggling with including constant battle for Trading Volume, Customer (Trader) Retention and inability to utilize enormous trading data they have. To solve those major issues, we have started a whole new eco-system named SoFinX (Social Financial Exchange) to equip Brokers and Retail Investors with variety of tools dedicated to making wiser Trading Decisions and Strengthen Relationships. The concept of this SoFinX eco-system is based on “Social Trading without barriers”, meaning that Traders and Brokerages are not limited to only their own Brokerage but can access a network of decentralized Signals (”Trading signal providers”). A Trader can be a member of “Brokerage A” and still able to follow/copy other Traders from “Brokerage B/C/D” and build their own Trading portfolio based on proven results of professional Signal Providers. Signal providers on the other hand can share their Signals with the entire market and become their own fund, earning profit shares from their followers. We see this as a Financial Version of “ Airbnb” , which can significantly increase Trading Volume of the Financial Industry, become an outstanding customer relationship tool for Brokers and reduce entry barriers and risks for Traders.  OTSO group is more than meet the eye, we provide not only Tech Solutions, but also Liquidity (through our own liquidity provider), Fintech Consulting (Turn-key Brokerage set up including licenses) and Data Analytics (we make trading data actually useful). Our team has strong experience in Finance , Software and Trading fields, professionals previously working for Fund Managers, Investment Banks, Liquidity Providers, Brokerages and International Technology companies. We are grateful to be funded and guided by Legends of Asian Banking industry.
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Software

Description: Treepli is a digital platform for independent travellers, providing a marketplace to exchange bookable user-generated itineraries.
Full Description: Treepli is an itinerary marketplace for independent travelers, inspired by the travel sharing economy and dedicated to curious people seeking authentic and personalised experiences. How does it work? We built a digital platform to facilitate the exchange of travel ideas and tips, where the ones looking for inspiration for their next destination can meet the stories of those who have already been there. Treepli is a community of travelers where the most experts become content creators, proposing detailed itineraries, including all info regarding where to sleep, how to move around, what to do and must-see places. All these useful recommendations are shared together with their own storytelling, made of photos, images and emotions experienced along the way. On the other hand, users that are willing to plan a trip, thanks to these genuine and first-hand tips, can organise each stop in a simple and intuitive manner. Just need to pick and choose an itinerary among the ones available in the portal, customise it based on the personal needs, and finally book each single travel product, from the outbound flight to the museum entrance fee, in a single seamless flow. This is a win-win mechanism: who is looking for ideas but is not willing to get the usual pre-packaged tour can actually create his own tailored trip, who shares his stories and hidden gems can value his experience, getting rewarded based on how many users he inspired to hit the road. Our project has already left the dock: are you ready to jump on board and join us?

Description: Tourmie is a SaaS Guest Experience application that helps hotels and vacation rentals enhance their guest experience.
Full Description: Tourmie enables hotels and vacation rentals to create unique guest experiences with minimal effort. It combines a variety of features, all in one easy-to-use application, personalized with guest details, customized with the hotel’s or vacation rental’s brand identity, and accessible from any device, without downloading or installing. Key features: • A digital guest guide with necessary information about the stay • An online check-in form to collect guest information • Seamless connections with local businesses • A booking engine for upselling and cross-selling • A management system for guest requests • A local area guide with recommended places to visit • Automated communication through email and SMS • A real-time chat with guests, and more With Tourmie, hotel and vacation rental guests can now access all the information they need before, during, and after their stay through their smartphone, without having to rely on traditional methods, such as printed materials or face-to-face interactions. They can make requests online, receive local recommendations, book additional services, and communicate with the host or staff, anytime and anywhere. In addition, Tourmie offers a range of personalized recommendations for services, such as transfers, activities, and rent a car, based on the guest’s preferences. This ensures that guests have a truly unique and customized experience, tailored to their specific needs.  Tourmie is highly scalable, with the potential to expand to new markets and offer a wider variety of services. Its automated booking and payment system allows for easy management of bookings and payments, making it easy to handle increased traffic and sales volume.

Description: Anti ageing Wellness Centers
Full Description: Let’s not beat around the bush: in the startup game, everyone's seeking that game-changing invention. But here's a provocative truth — the real disruptors? We don’t always invent. Sometimes, we just execute flawlessly on what’s already been discovered. Enter our game plan: harnessing the latest in Oxygen Therapy (Hyperbaric) research. It's the cutting-edge, but not of our making. The magic is in how we bring it to the masses. We've transformed late scientific findings into a thriving, tangible service, addressing issues from cognitive decline to long COVID. Why is this our pitch to you, an investor? Because scalability and execution are where many startups falter, but it's precisely where we shine. Our operational center in Vienna stands as a testament. And now, with a strong execution team at the helm, we're poised to replicate our success, quickly and efficiently, across Europe. This isn’t just about a longer life for customers; it’s about a robust, scalable, and lucrative life for investments. A venture that doesn’t bleed capital on R&D, but instead funnels it into growth and rapid deployment? That's the kind of low-risk, high-reward proposition savvy investors dream of. In the quest to reimagine aging, we're not just adding years to life – we're adding serious ROI potential to your portfolio.

Organization Name: Znap - Cash Rewards, Voucher, Payments & Deals
Industries: Apps, Coupons, E-Commerce, Food and Beverage, Information Technology, Internet, Marketing, Mobile, Retail
Description: Znap is a platform for brands to interact with consumers and for consumers to get rewarded to interact with the brands.
Full Description: Znap is a platform for brands to interact with consumers and for consumers to get Rewarded to interact with the Brands. Based out of Dubai, UAE. We work on a cycle of helping Brands to interact with consumers in multiple stages. Brand Recognition --> Product Interaction --> Purchase --> Repeat Purchase --> Loyalty We partner with brands to reach out to their consumers on a one-on-one basis through our platform. Here are the features that help us create a win-win situation with the Brands & Consumers 1. BUY VOUCHER & EARN CASH - Znap gives Cash Rewards to users to buy the store Vouchers that can help you increase voucher sales and promote your store. Rewards are attributed back to the same store for repeat purchase. 2. PAY WITH ZNAPAY & EARN CASH - Znap provides a secured payments strategy that enhances the consumer experience and drives loyalty when integrated rewards management into the payment and checkout process. We help brands promote their off-peak hours to attract consumers by giving Cash Rewards exclusively for those off-peak hours. 3. WATCH VIDEO & EARN CASH - Users can interact with Brands from the comfort of their homes and get rewarded with Instant Cash. 4. SCAN BARCODE & EARN CASH - Users can scan product barcodes while in store shopping to earn some extra cash and interact with the products. 5. TAKE QUIZ & EARN CASH - Users can then interact with Brands by taking a short quiz or survey to earn Instant Cash. 6. PURCHASE PRODUCT & GET CASH - Last but not the least - incentives users to purchase the product and upload their bills to get further Cash rewards. We believe that consumers drive our companies and we want to rewards these consumers with real cash for their efforts to interact with our Brands and Products. Znap has till date processed more than AED 890,000 (Nov'19) worth of bills and plan to process more over time to better understand your consumers.
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA), Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC), Middle East
Industry Groups: Apps, Commerce and Shopping, Food and Beverage, Information Technology, Internet Services, Mobile, Sales and Marketing, Software

On one hand, Keeperz app provides its users-community with a smarter way: to explore new pleasant dining experiences, enjoy attractive discount on their dine-in & takeaway bills at their popular restaurants, inspire their peers by sharing their authentic experiences and earn handsome cashback rewards for their loyalty & shared experience. Flexible Rewards can be redeemed at any Keeperz partner merchants. On the other hand, Keeperz app empowers its partner restaurants with an all-in-one marketing solution that allows them to run tailored promotional campaigns that perfectly matches their exact business needs and address their own pains & gains towards profit maximization.  Keeperz app is equipped with all marketing tools & techniques necessary to allow restaurants to: organically acquire new customers, enhance customer loyalty, increase average bill size and achieve optimal capacity utilization. The apps USP the recommendation feature that digitizes the “word of mouth”, by giving voice to restaurants’ happy consumers to become their brand ambassadors, bringing many new customers through the door and stimulating sustainable organic growth.  The merchants pay a recurring platform subscription fee and a per-transaction charge for the business that Keeperz drives to them.

Description: leveraging biotech to improve, protect, and restore ecosystem balance
Full Description: Environmental Quality Operations, EQO, was founded to bring the modern molecular biology laboratory to the field of environmental management. With their first line of services and automated sampling products, EQO aims to detect, monitor, and eradicate invasive species by utilizing over a decade’s experience in bioengineering, diagnostic development, and experimental therapeutic development. Environmental Quality Operations next generation detection services are built to provide targeted, highly sensitive, assays that allow for the earliest possible detection and robust analytics to determine the scope and location of nuisance species. In addition to best in class sensitivity and specificity, through analysis of various biomarkers, EQO services can determine population activity, life cycle, and dynamics. Environmental Quality Operations offers a first of its kind automated sampling platform, which can be installed at critical resources at risk of mussel infestation. Sampling occurs at programmable intervals and are stored in the device. When analysis is desired, simply send the sampling vessels to EQO and get results within days of receipt. In addition to their detection and monitoring services, EQO R&D is actively pursuing targeted biopesticide systems to eradicate invasives while avoiding off-target impacts, saving money on downstream remediation efforts and protecting the native environment.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Professional Services, Science and Engineering
Top 5 Investors: MassChallenge, National Science Foundation, Mazarine Ventures

Description: Guardian optical Technologies is an innovative israeli startup developing an advanced 3D sensor.
Full Description: Established in late October 2014, Guardian optical Technologies is an innovative israeli startup developing an advanced 3D sensor. By identifying typical motions their sensor detects the presence of humans within a given scene. This is done with sensitivity which is high enough to detect motions over a large scale, from a walking person to a sleeping baby. This unique property provides human detection with an outstanding confidence. Guardian's sensors replace in-seat pressure sensors, seat-belt sensors and standard drivers' cameras since they indicate location, physical dimensions and body position of each passenger. Guardian’s optical sensors use an advanced, patented technology that detects the presence of humans even where there is no direct line of sight. The depth sensor detects the motions of the various objects within a given scene. Their algorithm then classifies the typical motions of humans, animals and objects. Since their sensor detects the slightest motions, it provides segmentation with an accuracy and robustness which is unparalleled by any other technology today. Among other applications where human detection is desired, their sensor provides the first solution to the problem of babies forgotten in cars!

Description: Sofi is a fintech that promote a healthy financial lifestyle.
Full Description: Introducing Sofi, the groundbreaking solution to tackle the rapidly growing issue of consumer debt and delinquency. With over 70 million Brazilians struggling to pay their bills on time, resulting in a staggering global social problem worth $1.5 trillion, access to credit has become more critical than ever. Traditional debt collection methods, relying on 99% phone calls, have proven ineffective, with 94% of calls going unanswered. The landscape has shifted, and consumers now demand instant, user-friendly solutions that free them from debt burdens and restore their access to credit. Enter Sofi, the first AI-powered platform designed to revolutionize debt management and improve customer relationships for businesses. Using cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, Sofi empowers companies to gain invaluable insights into their customers' behaviors, enabling them to make more strategic decisions regarding debt recovery campaigns. With Sofi, users can effortlessly pay their bills with customizable payment plans that fit their budgets, while companies can reduce delinquency rates by leveraging empathy and personalization. This fosters a more sustainable economic and social development for all.

Description: The Wonder is a membership based space for families who crave creativity, culture and community.
Full Description: The Wonder’s design makes clear that the space has been created for families. Members enter to a Dyson-sponsored “stroller valet,” where they can park their strollers in a closet and return to oiled wheels and a full detailing. The parents-only lounge connects to the café—serving wine and “milk flights” of regular, chocolate, and strawberry—through a hidden entrance, so parents don’t have to run past their kids yelling “Mom!” to get a drink. The track list will play clean versions of Beyoncé songs instead of the “Itsy Bitsy Spider.”

Description: Bond Digital Health is a technology company developing end-to-end digital connectivity for the point-of-care diagnostics market.
Full Description: Bond Digital Health is a technology company developing end-to-end digital connectivity for the point-of-care diagnostics market. Developed by founders Ian Bond and Dave Taylor and originally designed as a patient self-management tool, Bond’s digital technology was remodeled to meet the needs of a client - a world-renowned innovator in point-of-care diagnostics and the lateral flow industry.					 The client required a digital platform consisting of a patient-facing mobile app and cloud data management for their new quantitative diagnostic test for chronic lung disease. They shared their experiences of working with us with a collaborator company who quickly commissioned Bond to develop a similar product for chronic wound care.  Others in the lateral flow industry recognised that an affordable, compliant and scalable solution was available highlighting a huge unmet need in an expanding market.  Bond is working in strategic partnerships with key industry leaders to create the next generation of digitally connected lateral flow diagnostics that provide an elevated user experience and enhanced real-time decision-making through the power of data aggregation and data analytics. Our regulatory strategy ensures that the solutions we create are secure, reliable and compliant with regulatory standards, making us a trusted partner to leaders in human health, animal health and agri-food globally. In Bond Digital Health we believe that collaborative working is the only way to tackle some of the major health challenges the world is nowadays facing.  Our technology brings the life sciences industry closer together to create solutions that improve the lives of millions. Let’s make a difference together!

Description: Developing Artificial General Intelligence
Full Description: ORBAI is developing Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) that can serve all of humanity from corporations to nations to individuals. It can gather vast amounts of information and assimilate all that data, store and analyze it, then, on-demand, concentrate and narrow it to provide accurate, relevant information briefs and very specific forecasts that are tailored for the customer's needs, using its prediction capability that make it a modern day oracle. It will also provide online AI professional services like customer service, personal assistant, financial advisor, medical, legal, and other more advanced ones using an advanced language interface for speech and text. https://youtu.be/YE31u1FmoyA https://youtu.be/YE31u1FmoyA ORBAI is working on a new AI architecture with proprietary neural nets, tools, and processes that allow us to build advanced sensory processing and memory systems that mimic the human brain's ability to perceive, remember, predict, and plan. With this and the built in language capability, our Human AI Interface is able to be a powerful conversational voice assistant on platforms like mobile, smart homes and appliances, and in your vehicle, and also perform real information and customer-facing vocations online, like Medical, Finance, Legal, and others. As the Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) core advances, it becomes more powerful, with a broader data reach, and more advanced cognition, planning, prediction, vocational and communication skills. Companies could use it to plan their corporate strategy via their current Enterprise Resource Planning tools by interfacing them to our AGI and having it watch and learn their company’s internal operations, gather data about their whole ecosystem of customers, suppliers, partners, competitors, and the other market factors, then forecast different timelines and how they evolve into the future differently according to their decisions, allowing you to optimize their corporate decision-making and plan effective prescient timelines for product development, marketing/PR, sales, finance, legal,… into the future. Ordinary people can use it to plan their lives, evaluating different decisions they could make, from career, to marriage, to finances, and to see the trajectory of events that would result, and the probable outcomes. They can access AGI professional services like Finance, Legal, Medical, Counselor, Fitness Advisor, and hundreds of others, and these services would be available globally, rivaling the best such services by humans. An Artificial General Intelligence will quickly become the most powerful tool that humanity has ever had, making the revolutions spawned by electricity, computers, and the internet pale by comparison. Where we are now overwhelmed by a world's worth of information we could never humanly assimilate in our work lives and our personal lives, we will have something that can for go through it all for us, and give us exactly what we need, when we need it.

Full Description: Granular.ai is a data analytics company that developed an artificial intelligence platform for satellite imagery. Satellite imagery offers an untapped source of real-time, ground truth data. Today, satellites capture 100TB of data daily. Put another way, it now has a birds-eye view of every inch on earth, every single day. This makes satellite imagery the only store of fast, objective, global-scale data. Using satellite imagery, businesses can fundamentally transform the way they operate and address critical knowledge gaps in their global operations. But today, unearthing intelligence from satellite imagery today in incredibly complicated. As a result, less than 2% of businesses have access to the technical expertise needed to unearth insight locked within behind the pixels.

At its core, the platform features more than 800 analyses of future phenomena – from technological and environmental to societal change, with a focus on the long term. Full Description: Solid# is a payments company that is specialized in real time employee disbursements. Solid# gives any employer the power to speed up the payment process through a simple payments gateway - eliminating the headache of cutting checks, keeping cash on hand or purchasing expensive gift cards.   Solid# offers debit card programs combined with an innovative online and mobile banking platform that allows users to create sub cards for any budget, load or unload their cards in real time, and send or receive money with anyone in the card network (P2P).  The Solid# platform allows  businesses to  track disbursements, view real time transaction data, and connect transactions to their payroll or accounting systems.  Solid# focuses on making this process seamless, easy and efficient for employers everywhere.  The company was founded by Adam Campbell and Michael Clark in 2018.

Description: Medtech startup working on clinical and wearable diagnostic and rehab products for neuro vestibular disorders using eye tracking technology.
Full Description: Cyclops MedTech Pvt. Ltd. is a Bangalore, India based start-up working on clinical and wearable diagnostic and rehabilitation products for neuro vestibular disorders using eye tracking technology.    Our first product, BalanceEye is a clinical diagnostic device for balance assessment and to find out the root cause for dizziness. Dizziness is a very common symptom and the causes vary. But if analysed properly, it can provide tell tale signs to what's happening in a patient's neuro vestibular system. Such diagnosis can help prevent strokes, detect tumors early and set right chronic balance problems. Through our device, we are finding out the root cause for dizziness with high degree of precision. Launched in March 2017, we have 46 paid installations across 26 cities in 3 countries.  We are building 2 other products in the neuro vestibular space.

Description: AI driven personal health data platform
Full Description: vivaLAB is an AI driven, digital health company delivering on the significant but unrealised promise of personalised health.  The company has built a unique data platform called vivaSOPHIA capturing both consumer real world data (such as lifestyle, nutrition, sleep, exercise, medication & status of the onset of chronic diseases) with muti-omics data (>8,000 biomarkers) from gut microbiome (metagenomics) & metabolic health (metabolomics) testing.  vivaLAB collects omics data every 6 months, with the lifestyle data complemented by wearables data collected on a daily basis.   Using this unique dataset, vivaLAB is developing multiple AI products: 1.	vivaDIETETICA: Digitised “Dietitian” to improve consumer health and wellness 2.	vivaBIODIVE: Biomarker identification position to develop next gen health  products incl: probio-pharmaceuticals, diagnostics, digital medical devices & therapeutics 3.	vivaEARLYGUARD: Patient clustering analytics & development of early disease detection models 4.	vivaTREND: Identify wellness trends, nutraceutical and probiotic product development & establish a health “snapshot” of populations & geographic regions The 1st product, vivaDIETETICA, launched in Australia in June 2023 as an MVP of up to 500 consumers is a disruptive DTC offer to the large and growing Vitamins & Dietary Supplement market, with a $3.1b TAM in Aust & $163b globally in 2022, growing at 9% CAGR to 2030.   Delivering a personalised wellness plan, this highly differentiated offer empowers consumers with data that is refreshed every 6 months. So as a consumer ages or lifestyle changes, so does vivaDIETETICA's recommendations maintaining consumer health & wellness This AI product development program represents a large global TAM being addressed either in-house in selected areas, or in partnership. The experienced founding team have built a comprehensive tech stack & compelling consumer offer ready for rapid scaling and international launch in the coming year.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Food and Beverage, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: Permia Sensing offering agricultural technology solutions.
Full Description: Permia Sensing provides field testing to detect Red Palm Weevil (RPW) larvae in coconut palm trees. This insect is known to damage an estimated 10% of the world's coconut yield, which amounts to approximately £450 million per year. Because it has attacked about 40 palm species in 60 countries, the World Food and Agriculture Organization (UN FAO) has declared RPW a global threat to the food industry. If RPW is detected within the first two weeks of infestation, chemical treatments are effective. Our field-tested IoT technology was created at the Morph Lab of the Dyson School of Design Engineering at Imperial College London, a World Top 10 University in the United Kingdom.
Industry Groups: Agriculture and Farming

Description: GreenJinn's unique technology and SaaS platform empower consumable brands to run traceable and effective media. #MakeMediaWorkHarder
Full Description: GreenJinn is a triple-digit growth UK platform for connecting great consumable brands with relevant consumers. Through our platform we work with some of the most exciting and cutting-edge brands to help them drive awareness, increase trial and get access to real-time, detailed consumer insights they can’t find anywhere else. GreenJinn started in 2017 with our intuitive mobile app which has grown to a community of 1M members with an App store rating of 4.7. Our partner brands offer cashback incentives to consumers to try their products which can be bought in most UK retailers, online and instore.  Our unique technology has evolved to help brands make their media more effective. GreenJinn Treasure was born out of many brands' frustrations with a lack of transparency on their media spend effectiveness. Our GreenJinn Treasure technology plugs-in to any digital or traditional media, gives consumers an incentive to pick up the product instore and tracks full funnel media performance from impression right through to in-store redemption. The best bit - we give brands access to a suite of live insights; consumer demographics, shopper, category and store level insights along with comparative conversion funnel data across media and channels. Sound exciting? We think so. And so do our brands! #marketing #advertising #FMCG #tech #consumerintelligence

Industries: Artificial Intelligence, Health Care, Machine Learning
Description: AI Automation and Virtual Care for Doctors
Full Description: In early 2015, we realized that there was a wealth of medical knowledge online but no intelligent interpretation or curation of it. We aimed to solve this by creating an Artificial Intelligence engine that could bring a patient to diagnosis based on their current medical state, symptoms and past medical history. In our pursuit we analyzed over 3 million patient records in engineering an AI model that could lead a naive patient right to diagnosis through simple questioning. Our algorithm became quite robust and reached nearly 80% accuracy. As we continued our research, meeting with more and more doctors, we found that the most immediately impactful application of our AI would come in automating medical documentation and administrative tasks slowing down practitioners. We decided to expand our focus from simply to diagnosis, to automating processes across the medical clinic. In everything we do, our goal is to help practitioners get back to what they do best ... medicine! Insig takes care of the rest! Why Remote Data Capture? Collecting patient information is absolutely critical in providing quality healthcare. Our intelligent questionnaire system automates the rendering of medical notes, the collection and organization of medical history, and rendering of any original paperwork/forms. Why Virtual Care? For some cases in medicine (i.e sick notes) there is little reason for a patient to come in. Why not provide your best patients with a premium service?
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software

In technical fields such as antennas, radio frequency transceivers, baseband time measurement, high-precision timing networks, high-precision fusion positioning algorithms, and location data judgment rules, it has obtained over 100 patents, soft works, and integrated circuit designs.

Industries: Biotechnology, Chemical, Health Care, Manufacturing, Medical
Description: Liverpool ChiroChem manufactures and supplies specialist building blocks for pharmaceutical research and biotechnology.
Full Description: Liverpool ChiroChem (LCC) is a chemistry-based CRO that produces chiral small molecules for biotech/pharmaceutical R&D. Their specialist products can be used as building blocks, fragments and screening compounds to enable small molecule drug discovery. their chemical technologies provide efficient access to novel chiral building blocks for hit identification and hit-to-lead optimization. LCC’s catalytic methods give access to a wide range of chiral amines in excellent enantiomeric purity. Their initial focus is on the production and supply of chiral piperidines and other sp3-rich nitrogen heterocycles , which are of great importance to drug discovery and development due to their excellent pharmacokinetic properties e.g. improved solubility and bioavailability. LCC's technologies were developed through years of research in the areas of asymmetric hydrogenation and Pd-coupling. LCC now provide collaborate services with their customers to optimise key steps in synthetic routes.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering

Black Buffalo delivers the same experience as traditional smokeless products, just without any tobacco leaf or stem – the taste, the texture, the rich dark color, and, the nicotine. Black Buffalo was established on July 14, 2015 in Chicago, Illinois by Mark Hanson.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Chicago Area, Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Consumer Goods, Food and Beverage, Other
Top 5 Investors: Listen, Vice Ventures, The Pritzker Organization, Watchfire Ventures, Open Pantry Food Marts

Description: Boulder Botanical & Bioscience Labs specializes in Research and Development (R&D) for custom formulations.
Full Description: Boulder Botanical & Bioscience Labs specializes in Research and Development (R&D) for custom formulations and large-scale contract manufacturing of private label cannabidiol-based products for clients including dietary supplement, nutraceutical and pharmaceutical companies.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Community and Lifestyle, Food and Beverage, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Description: Beequick Beijing-based online community services O2O
Full Description: Beequick currently provides one-hour delivery of fresh produce and other products from community convenience stores. It has served over 250,000 customers in Beijing, and plan to expand its services to other big cities in China.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Community and Lifestyle, Internet Services
Top 5 Investors: Sequoia Capital, Sequoia Capital China, Hillhouse Capital Group, Eastern Bell Capital, Tiantu Capital

Description: Stellate is a technology company that offers analytics and protection for GraphQL API.
Full Description: Stellate provides cloud-based solutions to cache, analyze, and protect GraphQL API. Their solutions include catching and shielding APIs, handling traffic spikes, avoiding downtime, and saving costs by lightening the load. They also provide sending of clients' queries as post requests, and completion of cached requests and enable companies to reduce origin traffic.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Philadelphia Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Internet Services
Top 5 Investors: Tiger Global Management, Tiny VC, boldstart ventures, System.One, Jeremy Yap

Headquarters Location: New York, New York, United States
Description: BioVaxys is a clinical stage biotechnology company  developing immunotherapeutic cancer vaccines targeting melanoma.
Full Description: BioVaxys Technology Corp. is a British Columbia-registered, early stage biotechnology company that is developing viral and oncology vaccine platforms, as well as immuno-diagnostics.  The Company is advancing a SARS-CoV-2 vaccine based on its haptenized viral protein technology, and is planning a clinical trial of its haptenized autologous cell vaccine used in combination with anti-PD1 and anti-PDL-1 checkpoint inhibitors that will initially be developed for ovarian cancer. Also in development is a diagnostic for evaluating the presence or absence of a T cell immune response to SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes COVID-19. BioVaxys has two issued US patents and two patent applications related to its cancer vaccine, and pending patent applications for its SARS-CoV-2 (Covid-19) vaccine and diagnostic technologies.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Founders: David Berd, James Passin, Kenneth Kovan

Description: Astrogate Labs provides high-quality products related to space infrastructure.
Full Description: Astrogate Labs is a space-technology startup. Astrogate Labs provides high-quality products related to space infrastructure. They use laser communication technologies intended to withstand the severe environment of space applications; they provide high-speed communications for small satellites.
Industry Groups: Manufacturing, Science and Engineering

Headquarters Location: New York, New York, United States
Description: AI-powered performance marketing and advertising platform for Digital signage and Digital Out of Home (DOOH)
Full Description: Parsempo is a Patented, AI-powered Display Management System (DMS) that makes it easy for screen owners to manage their screens, create engaging experiences, measure content and viewer performance, and programmatic monetization.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Advertising, Sales and Marketing

Description: Thyreos provides prophylactic vaccines for neuroinvasive herpesvirus infections.
Full Description: Thyreos is a company that creates herpesvirus vaccines and vaccine vectors for the animal and human health markets. The vaccines are built on a recombinant herpesvirus platform, which elicits strong immune responses without infecting the nervous system. Periodic reactivation of the latent infection causes the contagious shedding of infectious viruses, which is frequently associated with mild or severe disease.
Industry Groups: Health Care
Founders: Ekaterina Heldwein, Gary Pickard, Gregory Smith
Top 5 Investors: Invest Nebraska, National Institute of Food and Agriculture
